        <script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
	var plannedStart = current.resource_plan.start_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
	var plannedEnd = current.resource_plan.end_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
	var allocationStart = current.start_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
	var allocationEnd = current.end_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();

	if (!current.resource_plan){
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Resource Plan cannot be empty"));
	} else if (allocationStart > allocationEnd) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("End date of the allocation cannot be earlier than the start date"));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}else if(allocationStart < plannedStart ) {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Resource cannot be allocated before current Resource Plan's Start Date"));
	}
	else if(allocationEnd > plannedEnd) {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Resource cannot be allocated after current Resource Plan's End Date"));
	}
	
}]]></script>
